alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 6:01AM AKST until February 15 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FRONTAL PASSAGE WEDNESDAY... .Snowfall rates have been lighter than expected for some locations, but still steadily adding up. Many locations will start mixing with rain through mid morning. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Storm total accumulation of 5 to 8 inches expected. * WHERE...Gustavus, Elfin Cove, and Pelican. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixing with rain is likely Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; Glacier Bay
